channel.title: Mpc-Test on NearTao's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mpc-Test on NearTao's Blog

item.title: Akai MPC Live/X/One Plugin Track Velocity Test
item.description: Based on the above MPC Forums topic BUG ON MPC 2.9? PLUGIN TRACK LEVEL EFFECTS PROGRAM LEVEL I created a test project to see if I could reproduce the issue below. In essence, the poster was stating that when they change the velocity setting on the track level for a plugin, that it was impacting the velocity setting for another track with the same plugin. Unfortunately this is mostly what I have for information at the time, making it difficult to either confirm or deny the problem. Below is some notes on what I attempted to test to see if I could figure out what the poster was hitting because this wasn’t behavior that I had come across before.
